Laney Lambert
Hi there! I am a communication studies and political science scholar. I use the knowledge and skills from these majors to effectively advocate for social justice.



From Yeezus to Jesus: Kanye West’s Demagogic Tendencies

In this paper I used Roberts-Miller’s definition of demagoguery to shine light on the demagogic tendencies of Kanye West that has contributed to the large following he has gained making him one of the most influential stars today. While writing this I navigated how to pinpoint a broad topic, demagoguery, and apply it to a specific set of behaviors.

The Effectiveness of Student Opinion of Instructions

I chose this artifact to show the ability to conduct my own research effectively while also being able to collaborate with a group. In this paper I showcase the experience that students at the University of Alabama have had with the Student Opinion of Instructions surveys while highlighting what other researchers have said about teacher evaluations. I ultimately look at the results from the study that was conducted and other researcher’s work to determine if SOI’s are effective.

Blog on Cat-fishing

In this paper I learned how to write about a heavy subject in a more mainstream form of writing labeled as a blog. This was challenging because I had to assume the audience had little knowledge about cat fishing so I had to keep the blog informative but not overbearing. I learned how to find that balance by understanding who the audience is in order to effectively portray the message. This blog is on the cat-fishing epidemic we are experiencing as a society with the increase of technology.

Capstone Project

For my capstone project, I looked at the awareness level of human trafficking in the state of Alabama. The reason I chose to do my project on human trafficking is because of the following number: 24,900,000. That is the estimated number of people enslaved around the world through human trafficking. With the United States being in the top three countries of human trafficking crimes, it is important to raise awareness to help prevent that number from rising.

Excellence in Speaking

These courses challenged me with becoming comfortable standing in front of an audience and presenting effectively.
